ccacheHit.description: ccache hit rate during C++ compilation

clocks.description: Number of simulated main clock cycles (deterministic, for sanity checking only)

codeSize.description: Total size of all generated hot code

cpu.description: Sum of CPU User + CPU System

elapsed.description: Wall clock time elapsed during the step (time %e)

memory.description: Maximum resident set size durint the step (time %M)

speed.description: Frequency of main clock during simulation (simulated clock cycles / elapsed time)

system.description: Cumulative CPU time used by the step in kernel mode (time %S)

user.description: Cumulative CPU time used by the step in user mode (time %U)
